prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Reed, Drums, Brass, but without Guitar.
captions:
1. This composition features Piano, Bass, Reed, Drums, and Brass, but no Guitar.
2. No Guitar is included in this song, but Piano, Bass, Reed, Drums, and Brass are.
